wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Hamilton is a British canoeist based in Nottingham, England. He competed in slalom canoeing C1 from the mid-1990s to the mid-2000s and whitewater racing, single canoe (C1) and double canoe (C2) for Great Britain between 2000 and 2010.

response: * Andrew Hamilton (New Jersey governor) (died 1703), colonial governor of New Jersey
* Andrew Hamilton (lawyer) (1676–1741), attorney for John Peter Zenger in libel case, and Pennsylvania Attorney General
* Andrew Hamilton (rugby league) (born 1971), Australian rugby league player
* Andrew Hamilton (priest) (died 1754), Anglican priest in Ireland
* Andrew Hamilton, Lord Redhouse (1565-1634) Scottish law lord
